page.title: 16Local History
page.content: VISIT TO GRANGE FARM We were told an interesting story about monks from a long time ago. The monks used to smuggle the catholic people into the monastery,away from the soldiers.They used to take them down the secret passage to the Boat House.They got a boat and sailed to France. WALBOTTLE ROAD The bank between Walbottle and Newburn is steep.At the bottom of the green in Walbottle is a restored horse trough.Horses used to stop for a drink after pulling heavy loads up the hill. THE ROMAN WALL The Wall was built by Emperor Hadrians'soldiers.Ruins of the wall were found in 1929.At that time there was an apple tree growing in the middle of sections of the wall.
